lender.name: Emilio
lender.loan_because: I Think is a great way to help people encouraging them to work hardly, improve their life quality and no living from the goverment or NPO.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a truck factory and I am a volunteer of a NPO called "Un Techo para mi Pais"

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to do eveything I can to help people take care of themselves, because all to often your boot straps just aren't enough.

lender.name: Flynn Family
lender.loan_because: We received a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas and made our first loan which was recently repaid. We love the program and look forward to many more loans in the future.
lender.occupational_info: Ray sells building materials, Mary is a teacher and Brian is a student at University of Nevada.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: i love making an impact in peoples lives :)
lender.occupational_info: freshman at the University of California Berkeley

lender.name: Ayda
lender.occupational_info: Overseas sourcing ad production in Fashion Industry

lender.name: Tash and Nina Johnston
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to touch a person's life and make a difference, not just waste my time on this earth. I want someone to know that I love them even though I don't know them. Every person I lend to is chosen because when I see their picture I just know that they are the one I'm meant to pick. I believe that God wants me to pick them so that his plan for them can be fulfilled.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupation: retired teacher working in a bookstore
lender.loan_because: The way for all of us to survive and be happy is to help each other.

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: I want to hep people who work hard be able to make money.

lender.name: Nala
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm getting a belly rub!

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: hopefully, it will help someone to achieve their goals and provide for their family and community.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: We have so much in this country and it is heartbreaking to see these people struggling. We take basic things in life for granted and I would like everyone that we lend to, to have a fighting chance!
lender.occupational_info: I used to be an office manager in an accounting office, now both my husband and I are retired

lender.name: Nancy, Des Moines, WA
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a community college, and am proud of the fact that I assist students who didn't ever see college in their future realize dreams.

lender.name: Peter & Julie
lender.loan_because: It helps people.
lender.occupational_info: In order to accomplish great things in the future, I must preserve the foundations of learning.

lender.name: khaldoun Ajlouni
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all need some help at one point in our life and I believe in empowering people to help them live up to their potential
lender.occupational_info: I teach at the dental school, it's a very rewarding job to see my students evolve and become great dentists, I teach them and learn from them and threw my job I got to meet amazing people and make great friends

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I know a little will go a long way. The money goes directly to the hard working poor. Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Development of simple cost effective pollution and sanitation solutions.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with fellow citizens of the world. YOU CAN DO IT!
lender.occupational_info: I help my customers get parts for their electrical projects. I make advertisements and flyers for our business.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to see what happens. I want to see more done with the money than I could do with it myself.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: sometimes you just need a little push.

lender.name: Lux Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want help out.
lender.occupational_info: In our family our parents are retired. They have 3 grown children. One is a nurse, one works in the sciences and the other works as a psychologist. They have 7 grand children.

lender.name: Niles
lender.loan_because: if not me who?

lender.name: Margene
lender.loan_because: My friends gave me gift certificates for Christmas. What a wonderful gift!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank and handle all of the "people" issues that come up - from hiring to terminating employment.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Money was donated in my name last Christmas

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because:
i am fortunate enough to have the money to do so.
Also my girlfriend Amanda made my first donation for me...it was my christmas gift.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and this is a fantastic program to help others grow and be independant.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that offers a home and improved quality life to persons with psychitatric and behavior disorders.

lender.name: SaraSonic
lender.loan_because: It is good to help someone. I believe "do unto others as you would like others to do unto you".

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Even as a struggling student, I take satisfaction in being able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach music from around the world.

lender.name: Vedran Agovic
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help others achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone deserves a chance at life.

lender.name: edijs
lender.loan_because: I want the world to change faster

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I realize how difficult it is to obtain initial financing to achieve your goals in business.
lender.occupational_info: I focus on developing business for artists and celebrities within the entertainment industry.

lender.name: Vern
lender.loan_because: Small amounts of money from the western world's point of view can be leveraged through Kiva to hopefully give deserving entrepreneurs the little edge that may make a significant difference in their life goals.
lender.occupational_info: I build business for the consulting firm I works for.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: everything in life happens one person at a time, and that is what truly makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher (Spanish) and the school principal in a small rural school. I have been at this school for 25 years now!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it's important to share.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: we truly believe in helping others. It is good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies design and build computer networks.

lender.name: Skyler
lender.loan_because: I would have spent the money on something I didn't need.

lender.name: The Inskos
lender.loan_because: We loan because our parents taught us the joy of giving and we think it is important to teach to our little girls. Emily's father gave the family a gift certificate to Kiva for a Christmas present. We will enjoy choosing what loans to make as a family.
lender.occupational_info: Emily takes care of the home but spends most of her time volunteering in the community. Tom manages a region of mills (6) that make lumber products out of trees. The girls go to school and enjoy swimming and ballet after school. We are pictured here on the top of the mountain with one of our snowmobiles. Snowmobiling is a snow sport we enjoy as a family.

lender.name: Sheros
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward. And help others lest I am ever in the same place and need help. Perhaps I will make new business partners and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find the right customers and the right way to talk to their customers so that they will buy more of their product.

lender.name: Thu
lender.loan_because: I care to make a difference in another person's life. 'Giving' goes a long way. It offers hope to a dream, happiness to life and encouragement to entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working as a Graphic Designer for close to ten years. My passion is exploring the arts, learning the soul of craft and to pass on the wealth of knowledge.

lender.name: Bethini
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days playing with my sons and managing our home.

lender.name: Baden & Anna
lender.loan_because: I want too!
lender.occupational_info: I design and build roads and infrastructure like water, sewer, power, telephones, etc

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Emergency Dept of a small hospital with a very dedicated group of healthcare professionals. More than 100 people come for medical help every day.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to see others in given the same opportunities to succeed and prosper and provide for their families as I have been given.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a gift certificate as a christmas gift one of my best gifts ever
lender.occupational_info: I help people celebrate the lives of their loved ones, by helping them arrange an appropriate and uplifting event at the time of their loved ones death.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care for animals.

lender.name: Moe Sood
lender.loan_because: I like to think that it makes a difference in the lives of people who are striving and working hard to improve their and their children's lives.

lender.occupational_info: I am still in high school.

cares

lender.occupational_info: currently a 56 year old student! but also am carpenter, cook, volunteer, father of two young persons

lender.occupational_info: I'm currently serving as a Kiva Fellow in Thanh Hoa, Vietnam!

a close friend introduced me to this and it us a way for my dollars to give someone to change their world.
that speaks to me in a way that cuts to the core of my educational and moral backbone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small consulting company, with main clients in financial services, whose main source of income is risk/reward gambling.

lender.name: Fernando and Wife
lender.loan_because: We believe that we can make a better world if we share something with others that did not had the same opportunities

lender.name: Gunnar M
lender.loan_because: I started my own business once and wants to help others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people to sell their properties.

lender.name: Cedric
lender.loan_because: I have the chance to be in a country where entrepreneurs can be helped, so in return I want to help entrepreneurs in countries with less chance.
lender.occupational_info: Help brands enter the conversation with their customers on social networks.

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance! and I believe in the people I loan to!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an auditor. Once I have worked as an auditor for 3 years, and have passed all the required exams (!), I will be a qualified chartered accountant. I spend most of the year carrying out financial audits of companies, which tend to be large companies in the energy and construction sectors. The rest of the year I spend in college and taking exams.

lender.name: Charlie Mowat
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a leg up in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I am the founder of the Clean Space Partnership - an ethical cleaning company based in the UK.
Our ethical approach is what makes us different. Our ethics cover three areas:
People: We look after our cleaners so they look after our clients
Products: We use eco-friendly cleaning products and consumables (without sacrificing quality)
Waste: We have an integrated recycling service that makes it as easy as possible for people to recycle

lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life. Kiva gives me an opportunity to help others less fortunate in a meaningful way without fear I am helping "scam artists".

lender.name: Brent

lender.occupational_info: I am involved in pupil's guidance in our school (Grimbergen, Belgium).

lender.name: Trevor

lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the 4th grade.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I disagree with loans with high interest that burden people so I loan money to entrepreneurs through Kiva. Everyone should be given the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT.

lender.loan_because: it is a way of helping people when they really need it.

lender.name: Trond
lender.loan_because: People who makes an effort really deserves to be given a chance.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I believe that I have a responsibility to share the wealth and prosperity that God has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites for large companies and non-profit organizations to help them effectively communicate their vision.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: My daughter means the world to me.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I feel that they need the money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I have a little brother, a mom,a dad, and 2 dogs. I really like to read, dance, do crafts, play outside and play with my brother.

lender.loan_because: I do believe that everybody always has an idea for their own business, they just need a support to make the first move.

lender.occupational_info: I work in an international development agency helping governments improve education systems. Jewel is a doctor of natural health, Steph is a doctoral student in international education, and Simon is setting up his own hoem improvement business.

lender.name: Karry
lender.loan_because: I want to help the less fortunate to succeed in their endeavors.

lender.name: Phila Sewing Collective
lender.loan_because: it's important to support similar small businesses around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
We are a group of freelance seamstresses, manufacturers, designers, and sewing instructors in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, US.
We make a living off of our craft and skills and are committed to seeing others do the same.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to learn more about giving and the opportunities it creates.

lender.loan_because: Credit provides jobs.
lender.occupational_info: Retired CA, household manager, media consultant, new home sales

lender.name: Subtractive
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of the entrepreneur and being one myself, I understand the amount of dedication involved in the pursuit of obtaining goals and a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a producer of music & film projects. We have a production studio in Santa Monica, California where we create content for film, television, and the web.

lender.loan_because: my dads an entrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: i do my schoolwork

lender.loan_because: we care

lender.loan_because: This is fantastic way to help others as they fight for their own business, which takes a great deal of determination, even in the best of conditions!
lender.occupational_info: I am an ICU RN, and love what I do. I am very lucky that I get to practice my passion every day!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Sharing goodness is the best way of receiving goodness.
lender.occupational_info: I create images.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I have seen the impact that an individual can have on a person's life... or even that of a community. I spent some amazing times in South Africa in a children's hospital a few years ago, but my life is less flexible now than it used to be. This way I can still contribute and feel connected with people who are really trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for an insurance company in Chicago.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
Dreams need only opportunity. Everyone has dreams, but many around the world lack opportunity.
I have been very blessed with opportunities in this life time, and am pleased to be able to help provide one or two to fellow men and women around this world who are working hard to make their own dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites. Sometimes it's fun, and sometimes not.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I beleive in capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I am in the United States Public Health Service. I handle public health emergencies.

lender.loan_because: We love the stories.

lender.occupational_info: Mi laboro estas helpi popoloj atinigas iliajn revojn.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Random acts of kindness are the best ways to improve the world, one person at a time. **Vivere senza rimpianti**
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent graduate of Xavier University and work for AAA Allied Group in the Greater Cincinnati area. (Ohio, USA)

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering free enterprize, with that eventually leading to prosperity throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I assist technical school students to get jobs.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it is a common sense yet innovative idea that allows everyone to share the load...and only together will we make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a performing arts center at a university that presents and produces the arts --- including music, dance, theatre, and more. I help to manage the organization that employs about 100 people.

lender.name: hanne
lender.loan_because: I love to be able to help, and because of Kiva, i know that the money are going where its suppose to.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together, and there should always be the means for those willing to work hard to have happiness and contentment in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help lead a team of graphic designers and writers at an advertising agency in Philadelphia.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: My most important work now is grandmother-ing. Before I retired, I enjoyed developing business software until I went to seminary. I served two churches, while I was a minister.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by every persons strive for a better life and a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with sharing information about good ideas and business that lead others to develop and the whole region to develop sustainably.

lender.name: Gaby & Al
lender.loan_because: We want to help make life more enjoyable and prosperous for others.

lender.name: Ryanne
lender.loan_because: Quite simply, it is my obligation to help. Kiva provides me with an opportunity to share God's blessings and grace with others while honoring their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young girls about ancient civilizations.

lender.name: Julie-Ann
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself and have set up a large successful business as a writer plus 2 more businesses. I'm lucky in that living where I do in the UK I do not need financial support as my everyday budget and finances allow me to indulge in business ideas. I've travelled extensively and have unsuccessfully invested direct with entrepreneurs in locations like China and Bali and see Kiva as a great way to invest and support others without absorbing a large % risk myself.
lender.occupational_info: We write copy for websites, books, articles etc, and also we ghost write books.

lender.name: John Henry
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I learn

lender.name: nick
lender.loan_because: It is a nice feeling to help someone start a business when i know they would do the same for me.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's simply the right thing to do once you know about the program and the good it does.
lender.occupational_info: Project Finance lending in the North American energy sector.

lender.name: june
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, particularly women, rise up out of poverty through businesses they create or own.
lender.occupational_info: I make social learning networks, which means services that bring communities of people, in this case students ages 8-18, together in web sites like Kiva's. But my networks are for in-school use.

lender.name: Shayne
lender.loan_because: It assists in changing the lives of others. It gives others opportunities that they wouldn't have had otherwise. Many have contributed to my life in this way, now it's time for myself to contribute to others lives in the same manner.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a college student at BYU-Idaho

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I just recieved a gift certificate. This is my first experience at giving on a website like this. I am looking forward to tracking the success of the entrepreneurs who are benefiting.

lender.name: Manuela
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a simple way to reach out to fellow humans around the world and to start healing our common wounds.

lender.name: Jay Clark
lender.loan_because: One of my vendors turned me on to it!
lender.occupational_info: I work with large manufacturers in various fields - automotive, fuels and retail.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I have a small business too! It's hard to get going if you don't have some help.
lender.occupational_info: I make small bags and large tote bags. They are at www.bbkbags.etsy.com if you would like to see them.
